description: Gin, Kondo, Hijkata, Okita, and Shin are stuck in the public bath with the demons. Every lie they tell digs their grave deeper. Can they really get away with kicking heads in, ripping off horns, and setting demons on fire with lotion?

titles.title: Sentou de wa Shin mo Maruhadaka
The Bathhouse, Where You`re Naked in Body and Soul
銭湯では身も心も丸裸
